title: Saints by calling: or Called to be saints A godly treatise of our holy calling to Christ, by the gospell. With the seuerall gifts proper vnto the called: and their counterfeits in the hypocrites which are not partakers of this effectuall calling. Written by Thomas Wilson, minister of Gods word, at S. Georges Church in Canterbury.
author: Wilson, Thomas, 1563-1622.
publisher: Printed by W. Iaggard, dwelling in Barbican,
